      • registerExtension

        void registerExtension(PluginDescriptor pluginDescriptor,
                       Element extensionElement,
                       java.lang.String extensionNs)
        Registers a new extension.
        Parameters:
        pluginDescriptor - plugin to which extension belongs
        extensionElement - element from plugin.xml file where extension settings are specified
        extensionNs - extension namespace which is prepended to the tag name from extensionElement to form the qualified extension name.

      • registerExtension

        @Deprecated
void registerExtension(ExtensionPoint<?> extensionPoint,
                       PluginDescriptor pluginDescriptor,
                       Element extensionElement)
        Deprecated. Do not use.
